attributes.action: independant audit commitee made up of electoral voters from all local areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: each member of parliment should have his or her claims published at local level of goverment and aprroved by independant persons from local areas with stringent guidelines on pay and expenses and to be voted on at local level

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
